name: Off-Road Tourist Rescue Team
description:
Some are the adventurous type, some are in a difficult place in their life, some just have either a lot of free time or money or both, some are just out there escaping the heat wave. Whatever the reason maybe, folks love to travel to hilly areas and stay away from the flakiness and noise of the city scape.

Mountains never cease to surprise you with awe-inspiring beauty and a close to nature experience but they are also full of treacherous paths and windy roads. The snow doesn't help either. It leaves cracks in the path and then there is land sliding.


Amazing and interesting features:

-Real 3d big city off road environment
-Amazing and different type of vehicles
-Amazing sound system
-Used different and wonderful camera angel
